item.description:
Last Call for Tickets! Please Update Your RSVP. Wine List is posted on Boston Uncorked site. I have seen a preview of the food that Radius is serving and it looks great. Please allow extra travel time due to post Blizzard conditions.   

Join Boston Uncorked for an exclusive evening of fine food and wine at Boston's premier Four-Star restaurant, Radius! on Tuesday February 12 from 7:00-9:00 pm.

In honor of Valentine's Day they will be featuring a fine selection of fine wines and ports that will be sure to melt even the coldest of hearts. In addition to their amazing apps, Radius will also provide a variety of tasty chocolate treats to pair with a fine selection of ports.

Singles, couples and Anti-Valentine revelers are all welcome to join in the fun.

**Stay tuned for an exclusive wine tasting opportunity inside the wine cellar at Radius!** 

Capacity and Tickets are limited. Tickets are $39.00 per person. 

Check In is 6:45pm. For more information about the event and the wines go to [url=www.bostonuncorked.com][/url]. In order to attend you must purchase your tickets on line from Boston Uncorked.com in advance. Yes RSVP who have not purchased tickets before the event will be changed to no.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVPs with Tickets will be E Mailed. Arrive early and meet in lobby
item.name: Boston Uncorked Wine Event at Radius - Wines For Your Valentine
